document_data.name: Dhoelath
document_data.mainbody: '''Dhoelath''' was an [[elven high mage]] who lived in his tower, [[Dhoelath's Tower]], in [[Leuthilspar]] on [[Evermeet]].
document_data.Personality: The [[wizard]] was reclusive, but had been known to take on an apprentice.
document_data.History: Around [[1367 DR]], Dhoelath was an important defender of Leuthilspar.
